title: Apple Watch Series 8 review: if it ain’t broke, don’t upgrade
description: The Apple Watch Series 8 is an iterative update, and most of its changes are invisible to the naked eye. It adds new temperature sensors and crash detection, and makes the most sense for most people. But if your current Apple Watch isnt broken  dont shell out for that upgrade.
